thread.title: Growing up in the African Bush: warthogs, elephants, snakes - and the threat of extinction
thread.title_full: Growing up in the African Bush: warthogs, elephants, snakes - and the threat of extinction

author: Mike Pflanz
title: Growing up in the African Bush: warthogs, elephants, snakes - and the threat of extinction
text: Expat Life Growing up in the African Bush: warthogs, elephants, snakes - and the threat of extinction Saba Douglas-Hamilton fled the suburbs to raise her three daughters deep in the African bush. Here she tells Mike Pflanz about her everyday life Saba Douglas-Hamilton as a child in Nairobi, feeding a warthog Photo: Courtesy of Saba Douglas-Hamilton By Mike Pflanz
